sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import MainLayout from '../layout/MainLayout'; import './Checkout.css'; const Checkout = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', phoneNumber: '', fullName: '', addressLine1: '', addressLine2: '', city: '', state: '', postalCode: '', country: 'India', cardNumber: '', expirationDate: '', cvv: '', nameOnCard: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission logic here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); // Navigate to order confirmation page navigate('/vendi/order-confirmation'); }; const sampleOrder = [ { name: 'Premium Headphones', price: 2999, quantity: 1 }, { name: 'Smart Watch', price: 1999, quantity: 1 }, { name: 'Wireless Charger', price: 899, quantity: 1 }, ]; const subtotal = sampleOrder.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price * item.quantity, 0); const shipping = 0; // Free shipping const tax = subtotal * 0.18; // 18% GST const total = subtotal + tax + shipping; return (

Checkout

Complete your purchase by providing shipping and payment details

Shipping Information

Payment Method

Visa
MC
Amex
UPI

Order Review

    {sampleOrder.map((item, index) => (
  • {item.name} × {item.quantity} ₹{item.price.toFixed(2)}
    • ))}

Subtotal

₹{subtotal.toFixed(2)}

GST (18%)

₹{tax.toFixed(2)}

Shipping

{shipping === 0 ? 'Free' : `₹${shipping.toFixed(2)}`}

Total

₹{total.toFixed(2)}

 ); }; export default Checkout;
